about_the_game:
Sachi’s journey to find the truth in the heart of the Underworld is often full of peril, tough choices and harsh truths, however in her darkest times; the joy of music always remained.

Sit back and enjoy the sounds of the Smoke and Sacrifice Original Soundtrack and remember; the Pugbears are always watching...

Track List:
1. Main Theme
2. Village
3. Pugbears Invade
4. Temple
5. The World Beyond
6. Swamp
7. Brimstone
8. Industrial
9. Underground
10. Verdite
11. Wasteland
12. Truth and Reconcilliation
13. Trailer
